name: Protein interaction prediction in datasets formed by reference data from validated interactions
description: The main goal of this experiment is evaluate the PredRep workflow against the reference PPI datasets which were experimentally validated / manually curated.

datasets.description: It was built with 100 thousand positive pairs from hprd, dip and biogrid and 100 thousand false pairs from STRING (score between 100 and 200)
